Text:
I'm downloading this and will be seeding it for an indeterminate time. I'll later download many of your other goods, such as GK and Urban Chaos, and will also seed it as much as my ISP/bandwidth allows me. 

I'd just like to give you, Wanderer, a huge thanks from a fellow old gamer. Uploading this games is an act of inestimable value, keep doing this great deed and be sure that there are fellows throughout the world (I'm from Brazil) that really appreciate your work. 

Fair winds, ye old salt!
